description: Arsenal: Gunners Q&A - what will Arteta do to prevent defensive mistakes?
title: Arsenal: Gunners Q&A - what will Arteta do to prevent defensive mistakes?
title_page: Arsenal: Gunners Q&A - what will Arteta do to prevent defensive mistakes? - BBC Sport
maintext:
Simon Stone, BBC Sport
Work hard on repetition on the training ground. There is no other way.
Admittedly, Gabriel’s error in gifting Jadon Sancho a goal in New Jersey was not great, but Mikel Arteta is not on the pitch with his players – even though he gets quite close sometimes with his intense approach to coaching.
Once they get over the white line, he can only trust them to limit their errors.
He must believe in them. He has picked them.
